name: Adjustment Disorder with Anxiety
chief_complaint: I've been feeling really on edge and overwhelmed since I lost my job last month.
prognosis: Good with proper intervention, typically resolves within 6 months of stressor resolution
description: A maladaptive reaction to identifiable psychosocial stressor, characterized by predominant anxiety symptoms that develop within 3 months of stressor onset and are disproportionate to the severity of the stressor.
